metadata.Title: CVE-2021-33061 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: Insufficient control flow management for the Intel(R) 82599 Ethernet Controllers and Adapters may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable denial of service via local access.

notes.Note: sbeattie> may need two more commits according to the suse bug
